lead_paragraph: DIAMOND--Paul M. It is with great sadness we announce the passing of Paul M. Diamond on Wednesday, April 27, 2016, after a brave struggle with pancreatic cancer. Paul was loved by many and will be missed deeply by all who came in contact with his charm, humor, and generosity. Our lives will never be the same without him. He is survived by three sons, Craig, Eric, and Michael Diamond; a brother, Jay Diamond; a sister-in-law, Inez Diamond; a daughter-in-law, Vivien Diamond; a granddaughter, Samantha Diamond; two cousins, Lenny Pudt and Helene Pudt; and seven nieces and nephews. Services were held Sunday, May 1st at Gutterman's chapel, Woodbury, NY. Memorial contributions may be made to the Lustgarten Foundation for Pancreatic Cancer Research. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DIAMOND, PAUL M
